snippet: The release of her memoir, “My Beloved World,” suggests Sonia Sotomayor wants to play a larger and more personal role on the public stage than her colleagues.
abstract: Justice Sonia Sotomayor, with release of best-selling memoir My Beloved World, is suddenly the nation’s most high-profile Hispanic figure; release of book suggests that she has broader ambitions than her colleagues, playing a larger and more personal role on the public stage.
lead_paragraph: The release of her memoir, “My Beloved World,” suggests Sonia Sotomayor wants to play a larger and more personal role on the public stage than her colleagues.

headline.seo: Book-Tour Rock Star, Sotomayor Sees an Even Higher Calling
headline.main: On Book-Tour Circuit, Sotomayor Sees a New Niche for a Justice
headline.print_headline: Sotomayor, a Star on the Book-Tour Circuit, Sees a New Niche for a Justice
